createGroup(address,uint256).details: It creates a group with a custom Merkle tree duration.

params.admin: : Admin of the group. It can be an Ethereum account or a smart contract.

groupCounter().details: Returns the current value of the group counter.

updateGroupMerkleTreeDuration(uint256,ui.details: Updates the group Merkle tree duration.

validateProof(uint256,(uint256,uint256,u.details: Saves the nullifier hash to prevent double signaling and emits an event if the zero-knowledge proof is valid.

verifyProof(uint256,(uint256,uint256,uin.details: Verifies a zero-knowledge proof by returning true or false.
